CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: High short - circuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and power conversion efficiency ( 2.71% ) were achieved , which is a significant advance for efficient photovoltaic polymers that respond to the whole range of the solar spectrum .

Let's think step by step.

1. High short-circuit current: This is a property of a photovoltaic material, specifically the electric current that flows when the photovoltaic material is under short-circuit conditions. The unit of measurement given is mA/cm^2 (milliamperes per square centimeter). Therefore, the Material Name entity for this part of the paragraph is "photovoltaic polymers" or "efficient photovoltaic polymers."

2. Power conversion efficiency: This is also a property of a photovoltaic material, specifically the percentage of the incident solar energy that is converted into electrical energy. The unit of measurement given is %. Therefore, the Material Name entity for this part of the paragraph is "photovoltaic polymers" or "efficient photovoltaic polymers."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: High short - circuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and power conversion efficiency ( 2.71% ) were achieved , which is a significant advance for efficient photovoltaic polymers that respond to the whole range of the solar spectrum .

Let's think step by step.

1. High short-circuit current: This is a property of a photovoltaic cell, specifically the maximum current that can flow through it when the voltage is zero. The unit is given as mA/cm^2.
2. Power conversion efficiency: This is also a property of a photovoltaic cell, representing the percentage of the incident solar energy that is converted into electrical energy. The unit is given as a percentage.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2)
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%)

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2) |
| Power conversion efficiency (2.71%) |
